resources.string: What would you like to do?
Please use earbuds or \n headphones for this \n test
Make sure you\'re in a \n quiet environment

Your answers will only 
 be viewed by 
 Schoonenberg 
 employees

Welcome to the Schoonenberg Hearing 
 App. You can use this app to help us determine your hearing problems. All of 
 your answers will only be viewed by Schoonenberg employees. 

 We will introduce you to the app by showing you a short walkthrough.

We would like to ask you 
 some questions that will be 
 used in order to store 
 your information.
The answers will only be \n viewed by Schoonenberg \n employees.
Do you hear high tones in your ear?
Why do you need a hearing aid?

If you are satisfied with your answers 
 please click Finish. 
 
 If not, you can go back to change 
 your answers. Please remember 
 that you can always go back 
 once you click Finish.
Please use earbuds or\n headphones for this test
Make sure you are in a quiet \n environment
What kind of earphones/headphones \n are you using?
Use the + and - buttons to adjust \n the volume so you can just about \n hear the tone

We will give you a preview what 
your recordings will sound like 
 based on the hearing test you took. 
 
 You can choose any recording 
 you want from the list on the next screen. 
 
 After you have listened we will 
 ask you for your opinion.

In order to give you the best 
 professional advice, we would like 
 to invite you to visit 
 one of our stores. 
 
 When you click website you will be 
 redirected to our website 
 where you can find the store closest 
 to you and make 
 an appointment."

We would like to ask you about 
 the things you would like 
 to hear better. 
 
 Please record your situation 
 in any moment you have 
 difficulty hearing. 
 
 After you have recorded, 
 some additional questions 
 about the situation will be asked. 
 
 Your recordings will only be heard 
 by Schoonenberg employees.
"Please record a situation in which you have problems hearing
Some questions about your recorded situation
In which location/situation was this recorded?
How often are you in this situation?
How important is this situation for you?
